rows.label: tlk4632027601_msg0001
rows.name:
Welcome to Goth Isut, the capital
of the Holy See of Acedia.

rows.label: tlk4632027601_msg0002
rows.name:
The people of Acedia live in peace
and harmony thanks to the teachings
of Marveni, our beloved Pope.

rows.label: tlk4632027601_msg0003
rows.name:
Perhaps most important is the teaching that
it is never too late for anyone, even
criminals, to repent and live a good life.

rows.label: tlk4632027601_msg0004
rows.name:
The belief that faith can save any
soul and lead it down a brighter path
is one I hold dear to my heart.
